steps.name: TAA Operating State Publisher is ready with Advanced topology and not connected
Configuration parameter application.tainterfaceprocessor.heartbeat-timeout-in-ms is set to 2000
a PssGatewayHeartbeat message with the following attributes is received periodically in every 2000 ms
a SubscribeToTa has been published
a TaConnectionUp message with the following attributes is received
a RestrictionDataUpdate message with the following attributes in GeneralTransmission
a CapacityConflictUpdate message with the following attributes in GeneralTransmission is received
a SectionEntryPrevention has been published with
a ExecutionUsageRestrictionArea has been published with
